程序包 sokobanfx.business

类 GameLogger

java.lang.Object
java.util.logging.Logger
sokobanfx.business.GameLogger
public final class GameLogger
extends java.util.logging.Logger
GameLogger class is used for logging the game running information, which is also a singleton class.

  • 字段概要
